attributes.action: Ensure that EU and other migrant workers contribute to road taxation charges.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the ever growing number of foreign number plates on UK roads is it not time to introduce a levy on those who come to this country for work and social reasons.  I have witnessed hundreds of cars, vans and lorries on my daily commute not displaying a tax disc or any other badge that suggests they have contributed to road taxation as I and millions have over several generations.

rejection.details:
There are already several petitions in existence:
 http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/outtheeu/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
